SELECT permis.url, permis.`name`, permis.id, permis.type, lastPermis.`name` AS lastPermis FROM t_perms AS permis LEFT JOIN t_perms AS lastPermis ON permis.parent_id = lastPermis.id WHERE (1 = 1)
AND permis.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{permsName},'%')

SELECT permis.url, permis.`name`, permis.id FROM t_perms AS permis WHERE (1=1)
AND permis.url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT permis.`name`, permis.id FROM t_perms AS permis WHERE permis.type = #{type}
SELECT permis.id, permis.`name`, permis.parent_id FROM t_perms permis WHERE permis.parent_id = '0'
SELECT permis.id, permis.`name` FROM t_perms permis WHERE permis.parent_id = #{fatherId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_perms permis WHERE permis.url = #{requestUrl}
